channel.description: Recent content in architecture on Title

item.title: Architecture
item.description: I am passionate about architecture. Can’t say I know all the styles and movements but I tend to appreaciate a beautiful building. After all buidings are to us what a nice rock wall overlooking an open plane is to the Golden Eagle - they are our ‘environment’. If we are bound to live in and out of buildings we might as well appreciate them… Mosnchau Monschau - a small town in the Eifel with typical for Germany ‘Fachwerk’ houses.
